hero.title: Search your Dream Homes
hero.subtitle: Alot of homes enthusiasts just like you visit our website.

aboutUs.title: A Group of Ambitious Young Syrians
aboutUs.subtitle: Showcasing the beauty, diversity, and real estate potential of Syria

modernArchitecture.title: Modern Architecture
modernArchitecture.text: Blending contemporary design with Syria's rich architectural heritage to showcase properties that stand the test of time.

ancientHeritage.title: Ancient Heritage
ancientHeritage.text: Preserving and celebrating Syria's historical legacy while building a bright future for real estate development.

brightFuture.title: Bright Future
brightFuture.text: Symbolizing progress, unity, and hope as we work together to rebuild and showcase Syria's real estate potential.

showcasingCities.title: Showcasing Syria's Vibrant Cities
showcasingCities.text: We highlight Syria's most beautiful and diverse cities ‚Äî from the ancient streets of Damascus and Aleppo to the coastal charm of Latakia and Tartous, and the historical significance of Homs. Each city represents a unique blend of culture, heritage, and modern development, creating a tapestry of real estate opportunities that reflect the true spirit of Syria.

development.title: Development
development.text: Promoting sustainable development and growth across Syria's real estate landscape

culture.title: Culture
culture.text: Celebrating Syria's rich cultural heritage and architectural diversity

prideInHomeland.title: Pride in Homeland
prideInHomeland.text: Demonstrating our deep love and pride for Syria through our work

inspiringHope.title: Inspiring Hope & Unity
inspiringHope.text: Our mission is to inspire hope and unity through the lens of real estate. We believe that by showcasing Syria's beauty, diversity, and potential, we can contribute to a brighter future. With warm lighting, clean urban visuals, and a professional, elegant approach, we emphasize development, culture, and pride in our homeland.

visionForSyria.title: Our Vision for Syria
visionForSyria.text: We see Syria not just as a place, but as a promise. A promise of restoration, growth, and prosperity. Through our platform, we aim to connect people with properties that reflect Syria's enduring spirit ‚Äî combining ancient wisdom with modern innovation, creating spaces where history meets the future.

buildingTogether.title: Building Together
buildingTogether.text: We are a team of passionate young Syrians dedicated to showcasing the real estate potential of our homeland. Every property we feature tells a story ‚Äî of resilience, beauty, and the unwavering spirit of Syria. Together, we're building a platform that honors our past while embracing our future.

aboutUs.footerNote: From Damascus to Aleppo, from Latakia to Tartous ‚Äî we're here to showcase Syria's real estate potential to the world.

ourVision.title: We Want to Change the Game

noCommentPoints.title: No Comment Points for Prices
noCommentPoints.text: No need to leave comments or use points to get prices. Everything is transparent and clear from the start.

singleClearPrice.title: Single Clear Price
singleClearPrice.text: No multi-price based on your country, work, or anything else. One clear price for everyone, everywhere.

displaySyria.title: Display Syria to the World
displaySyria.text: Show Syria's beautiful properties to the world with modern standards like Europe and the Gulf.

browseListings.title: Let Syrians and All People Browse Beautiful Listings
browseListings.text: We want to let Syrians and people from all around the world browse and see how beautiful our property listings are. Search your way with many filters applied to give you the best experience.

simpleEasy.title: Simple & Easy
simpleEasy.text: Make things simple and easy for everyone to use

manyFilters.title: Many Filters
manyFilters.text: Search with many filters applied up to users' preferences

privacySearch.title: Privacy Search
privacySearch.text: No one from your Facebook relatives will observe you searching for your dream property

madeWithLove.title: Made with Love
madeWithLove.text: We want you to know that this app will keep having modifications and improvements. We are committed to continuously enhancing our user experience to give you the best possible experience.

feedbackMatters.title: Your Feedback Matters
feedbackMatters.text: Positive and negative comments are welcome! We value your input and use it to make AqaarGate better every day. Your feedback helps us understand what works and what needs improvement, ensuring we deliver the best experience for everyone.

featuresComingSoon.title: Many Features Coming Soon
featuresComingSoon.text: Many, many features will come soon! We are constantly working on new enhancements, tools, and capabilities to make your property search and browsing experience even better. Stay tuned for exciting updates!

ourVision.footerNote: We're here to serve you, and we appreciate every piece of feedback that helps us grow.

rentalService.title: Property Rental Management Service
rentalService.subtitle: Let AqaarGate handle your property rental needs with our comprehensive, professional management service

fullServiceManagement.title: Full-Service Property Management
fullServiceManagement.text: Our specialized maintenance team ensures your property remains in excellent condition throughout the rental period. We guarantee to maintain the property in the same condition as when we received it.

formalAgreement.title: Formal Rental Agreement
formalAgreement.text: We operate under a formal agreement between AqaarGate and the property owner. Both parties agree on rental duration and rental price, ensuring transparency and mutual understanding.

submitProperty.title: Submit Your Property Details
submitProperty.text: Fill out our comprehensive property submission form with all relevant details including property type, size, bedrooms, bathrooms, features, and location.

propertyInspection.title: Property Inspection
propertyInspection.text: Our professional team will visit your property to conduct a thorough inspection and assessment.

agreementFinalization.title: Agreement Finalization
agreementFinalization.text: After inspection, we'll finalize the rental agreement, including rental duration, rental price, and commission terms (minimum 20% commission).

managementBegins.title: Property Management Begins
managementBegins.text: Once the agreement is signed, we take over property management, maintenance, and rental operations, ensuring your property is well-maintained and generating income.

rentalService.commissionText: Our company charges a minimum commission of
rentalService.commissionText2: of the rental amount. Additional terms and details can be negotiated between both parties to ensure a mutually beneficial agreement.
rentalService.agreementTermsText: Rental duration, rental price, commission percentage, maintenance responsibilities, and any additional negotiated terms.

rentalService.whyChoose: Why Choose AqaarGate Property Rental Service?

specializedMaintenance.title: Specialized Maintenance Team
specializedMaintenance.text: Our dedicated maintenance team ensures your property stays in perfect condition throughout the rental period.

conditionGuarantee.title: Condition Guarantee
conditionGuarantee.text: We guarantee to maintain your property in the same excellent condition as when we received it.

formalAgreementBenefit.title: Formal Agreement
formalAgreementBenefit.text: All terms are clearly defined in a formal agreement, ensuring transparency and peace of mind.

joinTeam.description: We're focused on growing our platform and serving our clients better. Check back regularly as we expand our team with exciting opportunities in real estate, technology, and customer service.

whyChooseOurService.title: Why Choose Our Service?
whyChooseOurService.answer:
Discover a modern and elegant way to showcase real estate in Syria. Our platform is designed to present every property with clarity, sophistication, and professionalism, ensuring that all details about the property and its owner are easily accessible ‚Äî no extra explanations needed.

We do not act as intermediaries between buyers and sellers. Our role is simply to provide a trusted, transparent space where listings can be displayed beautifully and efficiently.

Whether you're in Syria or living abroad, our platform makes it easy to browse, explore, and choose your future home from anywhere in the world. With a sleek design and user-friendly experience, finding your dream property has never been simpler.

howSecureAreYourServices.title: How Secure Are Your Services?
howSecureAreYourServices.answer: Your security is our top priority. We use advanced technologies to keep your data and account safe, including password encryption with bcrypt, JWT authentication, and protected APIs. Access to features and data is controlled through role-based permissions (for users and agents), and all communications occur over secure HTTPS connections. We also ensure secure token storage and transmission to maintain complete protection at every step.

customerSupportService.title: Customer Support Service
customerSupportService.answer: We're here for you ‚Äî anytime, anywhere. Our customer support team is available 24/7, ready to help with any inquiries or issues you may have. You can also reach us through our dedicated complaints email, and we'll make sure to respond within 24 hours.

howCanIUpdateMyAccountInformation.title: How Can I Update My Account Information?
howCanIUpdateMyAccountInformation.answer:
Updating your account information is quick, simple, and secure. You can easily make any changes directly through your user dashboard, and no additional approval is required.

If any major updates or changes occur, we'll make sure to notify you in advance via in-app notifications and email alerts, so you're always informed and up to date with your account details.

howDoYouCalculateFees.title: How Do You Calculate Fees?
howDoYouCalculateFees.answer: Good news! Our platform is completely free for the first six months. If we introduce any fees in the future, we'll give you a full month's notice via email and our communication channels, so you'll always be informed in advance.

howDoIPayMyInvoices.title: How Do I Pay My Invoices?
howDoIPayMyInvoices.answer: You can pay your invoices via bank transfer through Al-Haram or any money transfer center. Once the payment is confirmed, your points will be added to your account. You can also pay using Sertel Cash or MTN Cash. This process is fast and usually takes no more than 3 hours.

areThereAnyHiddenFees.title: Are There Any Hidden Fees Not Displayed In The Pricing Table?
areThereAnyHiddenFees.answer: No, there are no hidden fees on our platform. Everything is transparent and clearly displayed, which is one of the key standards we pride ourselves on. We do not take any commission between buyers and sellers‚Äîwe simply provide a modern, professional platform to showcase properties and holiday homes. If any changes occur, all users will be notified at least one month in advance.

whatIsTheRefundProcedure.title: What Is The Refund Procedure?
whatIsTheRefundProcedure.answer: This feature will be available soon. We'll provide full details on how to request a refund once it's launched.

isThereFinancialOrAccountingSupport.title: Is There Financial Or Accounting Support?
isThereFinancialOrAccountingSupport.answer: Absolutely! Our dedicated financial support team is here to help. Rest assured, your funds and points are always safe and fully protected.

whatLanguagesDoesYourServiceSupport.title: What Languages Does Your Service Support?
whatLanguagesDoesYourServiceSupport.answer: Our service currently supports English, and Arabic will be available soon.

whatAreTheSafetyFeatures.title: What Are The Safety Features Of Your System?
whatAreTheSafetyFeatures.answer:
Our platform implements comprehensive security protocols to protect users and data:

JWT-Based Authentication: Secure and stateless user sessions.

Encrypted Password Storage: Passwords stored using strong hashing algorithms.

Authorized API Access: Protected API endpoints requiring valid tokens.

Role-Based Access Control (RBAC): Fine-grained permissions for agents and regular users.

HTTPS Data Transmission: All data transmitted securely over encrypted channels.

Authorization Enforcement: Users can only access or modify their own resources.

Secure Critical Operations: Sensitive actions like creating, updating, or deleting listings require verified authentication.

howCanIRequestNewFeatures.title: How Can I Request New Features?
howCanIRequestNewFeatures.answer:
We love hearing from you! Whether it's a suggestion or constructive feedback, your ideas help us make the platform better. You can share your requests in any of these ways:

Call Us: Reach us at the phone number listed on our Contact Us page.

Email Us: Send your ideas to the email address on the same page.

Submit a Form: Fill out the form on our website to send your feature request or suggestion directly.

Your feedback matters, and we're always excited to bring new features to life based on what our users need!

isMyDataProtected.title: Is My Data Protected?
isMyDataProtected.answer: Absolutely! Your data is safe with us. Passwords are securely hashed, all communications are encrypted, and only authorized users can access sensitive info. From personal details to property listings, we use multiple layers of security to keep your information private and protected.

havingTechnicalIssues.title: Having Technical Issues?
havingTechnicalIssues.answer: Report it quickly via phone, email, or our website form, and our team will help you get back on track.

blog.subtitle: We're working hard to bring you amazing content about real estate, property tips, and market insights. Stay tuned for exciting articles coming your way!

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.introduction: Welcome to AqaarGate. Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms," "Agreement," or "Terms of Service") carefully before accessing or using the AqaarGate website, mobile applications, or any of our real estate services (collectively, the "Service"). These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you ("User," "you," or "your") and AqaarGate ("we," "our," or "us"). By accessing or using our Service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, you must not access or use our Service. The headings in this Agreement are for convenience only and do not affect the interpretation of these Terms.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using AqaarGate ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. These Terms apply to all users, including but not limited to visitors, registered members, property owners, agents, and brokers who access AqaarGate via the website, mobile application, APIs, or any related digital platform. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

section2.title: 2. Use License
section2.intro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of AqaarGate per device for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
section2.list2: use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
section2.list3: attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on AqaarGate
section2.list4: remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
section2.conclusion: All rights not expressly granted to you under this license are reserved by AqaarGate. You may not sublicense, sell, or otherwise exploit any material from the Service.

section3.title: 3. Property Listings and Information
section3.verificationContent: All property listings posted by agents must go through our manual verification and approval process before they appear on our website and mobile application. This is a manual review process where our administrative team carefully examines each listing to ensure it meets our quality standards, accuracy requirements, and complies with our terms and conditions. The verification process is designed to protect users and maintain the integrity of our platform. The verification process will not take long, and you will be notified once your listing is approved or if any changes are required.
section3.adminRightsContent: AqaarGate administrators reserve all rights to delete or change the status of any property listing at any time if we notice any unusual actions, suspicious behavior, or violations of our terms and conditions. This includes but is not limited to: scam activities, failure to respond to client inquiries, mock or fake listings, misleading information, fraudulent property details, or any other actions that compromise the integrity of our platform or harm users. Administrators may immediately remove listings, change their approval status, or take any other necessary actions to protect users and maintain platform quality. Agents will be notified of any administrative actions taken on their listings.
section3.disclaimer: AqaarGate provides property listings and related information for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any property information, including but not limited to:
section3.disclaimerList4: Legal status or ownership of properties
section3.thirdPartyContent: Some property listings and related information are submitted by third parties, including users and real estate professionals. AqaarGate does not verify, endorse, or guarantee such information and is not responsible for any inaccuracies, errors, or omissions.
section3.holidayHomesContent: Holiday Home property listings can only be posted by AqaarGate administrators. Agents cannot post Holiday Home listings directly. When users submit a rental service request for a Holiday Home property, the listing will be reviewed and processed by our administrators. Once the rental agreement is finalized and agreed upon by both parties (Party A and Party B), the Holiday Home listing will be posted by AqaarGate administrators. This process ensures proper verification and compliance with our platform standards.
section3.rentPeriodContent: For all property listings except Villa and Farm properties, the minimum rent period is three (3) months. This restriction is implemented to avoid misuse of properties and to ensure responsible rental practices. Villa and Farm properties are excluded from this restriction and can be rented on a daily basis or for any period as specified by the property owner or agent. This policy applies to all rental listings on our platform.

section4.title: 4. User Accounts and Responsibilities
section4.intro: When creating an account with AqaarGate, you agree to:
section4.list1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
section4.list2: Maintain and update your account information
section4.list3: Keep your password secure and confidential
section4.list4: Accept responsibility for all activities under your account
section4.list5: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use
section4.suspensionContent: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account, without prior notice, if we suspect fraudulent activity, violation of these Terms, or misuse of our platform. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
section4.deletionContent: Once you delete your account, you will no longer be able to access the Service or perform any actions. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted from our records. This includes but is not limited to your profile information, property listings, messages, favorites, reviews, and any other data associated with your account. Account deletion is irreversible, and we cannot restore your account or data after deletion. Please ensure you have saved any important information before proceeding with account deletion.

section5.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
section5.list1: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to perform unlawful acts
section5.list2: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
section5.list3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
section5.list4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
section5.list5: To submit false or misleading information
section5.list6: To upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code
section5.list7: Use automated systems (including bots, crawlers, or data mining tools) to access or collect data from AqaarGate
section5.list8: Post duplicate, fake, misleading, or fraudulent property listings
section5.list9: Engage in spam activity or create multiple accounts for abusive purposes

section6.title: 6. Agent and Broker Services
section6.verificationContent: All agents must be verified through their phone number and email address before they can perform any actions from their dashboard. Once an agent is authorized and verified by AqaarGate administrators, they will have full access to all dashboard features and functionalities. During the verification process, agents are required to provide accurate contact information. Once verified, the phone number and email address in the agent's profile will be disabled and cannot be changed. This ensures account security and prevents unauthorized modifications to verified contact information.
section6.blockingContent: AqaarGate administrators reserve the right to block any agent's account at any time if the agent violates our terms and conditions, breaks any rules, performs scam actions, fails to respond to client inquiries in a timely manner, or if there are legitimate complaints filed against the agent. Once an agent is blocked by an administrator, all of their property listings will immediately disappear from the platform and will not be visible or accessible to clients. Blocked agents will lose access to their dashboard and all platform features. This policy is implemented to protect users, maintain platform integrity, and ensure quality service standards. Agents who are blocked may be subject to permanent account termination depending on the severity of the violation.
section6.disclaimer: AqaarGate facilitates connections between users and real estate professionals. We are not a licensed real estate broker or agent. All real estate transactions are conducted directly between users and licensed professionals. We:
section6.disclaimerList1: Do not participate in real estate transactions
section6.disclaimerList2: Do not provide legal, financial, or tax advice
section6.disclaimerList3: Are not responsible for the actions of agents or brokers
section6.disclaimerList4: Do not guarantee the performance of any real estate professional

section7.title: 7. Listing Fees and Points Calculation
section7.dynamicContent: Each property listing requires a different amount of points to publish, calculated by our proprietary algorithm based on various property characteristics. The listing fee (in points) varies depending on the property's features and specifications.
section7.algorithmContent: Our algorithm calculates the listing publication cost based on the following factors:
section7.factor1: Property Characteristics: Number of bedrooms and bathrooms
section7.factor2: Location: City where the property is located
section7.factor3: Property Size: Square footage or land area (size)
section7.factor4: Furnished Status: Whether the property is furnished or unfurnished
section7.factor5: Amenities: Number and type of amenities included with the property
section7.displayContent: Before you submit your property listing for publication, our platform will automatically calculate and display the exact number of points required to publish your listing based on your property's characteristics. You will see the total points cost calculated by our algorithm before proceeding with publication.
section7.consentContent: You must review and agree to the displayed points cost before your listing will be submitted for publication. By clicking "Publish," "Submit," or any similar confirmation button after reviewing the points cost, you confirm:
section7.consentList1: Your agreement to pay the specified number of points for listing publication
section7.consentList2: Your authorization for AqaarGate to deduct these points from your account balance
section7.consentList3: Your understanding that the points cost may vary for different properties
section7.balanceContent: You must have sufficient points in your account balance to cover the listing publication cost at the time of submission. If your account does not have enough points, you will need to purchase additional points before proceeding with publication. The platform will notify you if your points balance is insufficient.
section7.updatesContent: Our pricing algorithm may be updated from time to time to reflect market conditions, service improvements, or other factors. This may result in different point costs for similar properties submitted at different times. The points cost displayed and agreed upon at the time of submission is the final and binding cost for that specific listing, regardless of future algorithm changes.
section7.refundContent: Once points are deducted for listing publication and the listing is approved and published, the points are non-refundable unless the listing is rejected during our review process or in other specific circumstances as outlined in our refund policy. You cannot receive a refund of points based solely on dissatisfaction with the point cost after agreeing to and completing the publication process.

section8.title: 8. Intellectual Property Rights
section8.content1: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of AqaarGate and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without our prior written consent.
section8.content2: By uploading or submitting content (including images, descriptions, property listings, or other media), you grant AqaarGate a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual license to use, display, distribute, modify, and reproduce such content in connection with the Service and for marketing purposes.

section9.title: 9. Privacy Policy
section9.content: Your privacy is important to us. Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices.

section10.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
section10.content1: In no event shall AqaarGate, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from your use of the Service.
section10.content2: In no event shall AqaarGate's total liability to you for any claims arising out of or relating to the Service exceed the amount, if any, paid by you to AqaarGate during the six (6) months prior to the event giving rise to liability, or $100, whichever is greater.

section11.title: 11. Disclaimer
section11.content: The information on this Service is provided on an "as is" basis. To the fullest extent permitted by law, AqaarGate excludes all representations, warranties, conditions and terms relating to our Service and the use of this Service. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure, or that any information obtained will be accurate or reliable.

section12.title: 12. Governing Law
section12.content1: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed by the laws of the Syrian Arab Republic, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from or relating to these Terms or your use of the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the Syrian Arab Republic.
section12.content2: Before filing a formal legal action, both parties agree to attempt to resolve disputes amicably through negotiation or mediation.

section13.title: 13. Changes to Terms
section13.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. ONGOING MODIFICATIONS: This application will continue to undergo modifications and updates. If a revision is material, we will provide all types of users (regular users and agents) with at least one (1) full month's advance notice prior to any new terms taking effect. Continued use of the Service after any such modifications constitutes acceptance of the revised Terms. It is your responsibility to review these Terms periodically for any changes.

section14.title: 14. Contact Information
section14.intro: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

section15.title: 15. Advertisements and Google AdSense
section15.thirdPartyContent: AqaarGate may display advertisements, including Google AdSense advertisements, on our platform. These advertisements may be served by third-party advertising companies and may use cookies, web beacons, or similar technologies to collect information about your visits to our website and other websites.
section15.adsenseContent: We use Google AdSense and other advertising services to display ads on our platform. Google AdSense uses cookies and similar technologies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website and other websites. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ads Settings or by managing your cookie preferences in your browser.
section15.endorsementContent: The presence of advertisements on our platform does not constitute an endorsement, recommendation, or sponsorship by AqaarGate of the advertised products, services, or companies. We are not responsible for the content, accuracy, or practices of third-party advertisers.
section15.choicesContent: You may choose to disable cookies in your browser settings, which may affect your ability to interact with our platform and view certain advertisements. For more information about how we use cookies and tracking technologies, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

section16.title: 16. Ongoing Modifications and Updates
section16.evolutionContent: AqaarGate is an evolving platform that will continue to undergo modifications, updates, and improvements. We regularly update our features, functionality, design, and services to enhance user experience and comply with technological and legal requirements.
section16.developmentContent: These modifications may include but are not limited to:
section16.devList1: Updates to features, user interface, and functionality
section16.devList2: Changes to payment methods, pricing, or subscription packages
section16.devList4: Compliance with Syrian laws and regulations
section16.devList5: Integration of new services or third-party tools (including advertising services like Google AdSense)
section16.notificationContent: We will notify users of material changes as required by these Terms. By continuing to use the Service, you acknowledge that the platform may change and you agree to adapt to such modifications. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the Service at any time, with or without notice.

section17.title: 17. Severability
section17.content: If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid, illegal, or unenforceable by a court of competent jurisdiction in the Syrian Arab Republic, the remaining provisions will remain in full force and effect. The invalid, illegal, or unenforceable provision shall be replaced with a valid, legal, and enforceable provision that comes closest to the intent of the original provision.

section18.title: 18. Entire Agreement
section18.content: These Terms, together with our Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between you and AqaarGate regarding your use of the Service and supersede all prior agreements, understandings, negotiations, and discussions, whether oral or written, relating to the subject matter hereof. No modification, amendment, or waiver of any provision of these Terms shall be effective unless in writing and signed by both parties.

section19.title: 19. Force Majeure
section19.content: AqaarGate shall not be liable for any delays, failures, or inability to perform its obligations under these Terms due to circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to natural disasters, wars, acts of terrorism, government actions, internet outages, cyberattacks, equipment failures, or other force majeure events. In such events, AqaarGate will use reasonable efforts to notify users and resume normal operations as soon as practicable.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: AqaarGate ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

subsection1.title: 1.1 Personal Information
subsection1.intro: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:

subsection2.title: 1.2 Automatically Collected Information
subsection2.intro: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:
subsection2.list4: Pages visited and time spent on pages

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect to:
section2.list2: Process transactions and send related information
section2.list3: Send you technical notices and support messages
section2.list4: Respond to your comments and questions
section2.list6: Send you marketing communications (with your consent)

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:

subsection1.title: 3.1 With Real Estate Professionals
subsection1.content: When you express interest in a property or contact an agent, we may share your contact information and property preferences with the relevant real estate professional to facilitate communication.

subsection2.title: 3.2 Service Providers
subsection2.content: We may share information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business, or serving our users. These parties are bound by confidentiality agreements.

subsection3.title: 3.3 Legal Requirements
subsection3.content: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid legal processes, such as subpoenas or court orders.

section4.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section4.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
section4.list2: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
section4.conclusion: You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
section5.content2: Your password is encrypted using industry-standard encryption algorithms. No one, including AqaarGate administrators, can access or view your password in plain text. Only you, as the account owner, can change your password. We cannot retrieve or reset your password without your authorization through the password reset process. Your password security is your responsibility, and you should never share your password with anyone.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices
section6.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
section6.right1: Access: Request access to your personal information
section6.right2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate information
section6.right3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
section6.right4: Portability: Request transfer of your data

section7.title: 7. Data Retention and Account Deletion
section7.content1: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it.
section7.content2: Once you delete your account, you will no longer be able to access the Service or perform any actions. Your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted from our records. This includes but is not limited to your profile information, property listings, messages, favorites, and any other data associated with your account. Account deletion is irreversible, and we cannot restore your account or data after deletion. Please ensure you have saved any important information before proceeding with account deletion.

section8.title: 8. International Data Transfers
section8.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure that such transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and implement appropriate safeguards to protect your information.

section9.title: 9. Children's Privacy
section9.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete such information.

section10.title: 10. Third-Party Links
section10.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party sites you visit.

section11.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section11.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

section13.title: 13. AqaarGate's Business Model and Usage
section13.platformTitle: Platform Role - No Interference Between Sellers and Buyers:
section13.platformContent: AqaarGate operates solely as a listing platform that displays property information. We do NOT interfere between sellers and buyers. All communications, negotiations, agreements, and transactions occur directly and exclusively between property sellers (or their agents) and property buyers. AqaarGate is not involved, does not participate, and has no role in any aspect of real estate transactions between parties.
section13.revenueTitle: Revenue Model - Points from Listing Publications:
section13.revenueContent: AqaarGate's revenue and profit come from points that agents pay when they publish property listings on our platform. We do NOT receive any commission, fee, or benefit from property sales or rentals between sellers and buyers. Our revenue is generated exclusively through:
section13.revenueList1: Listing Publication Points: Points deducted from agent accounts when they publish property listings on our platform
section13.revenueList2: Agent Subscription Packages: Package subscriptions (basic, premium, enterprise) purchased by agents
section13.revenueList3: Points Purchases: Points purchased by agents to maintain their account balance for listing publications
section13.revenueList4: Platform Usage Fees: Other platform usage fees (if applicable in the future)
section13.noBenefit: AqaarGate has NO financial interest, benefits, commissions, or any other form of compensation from transactions between sellers and buyers. We do not participate in, facilitate, or benefit from any real estate transactions between parties.
section13.notificationContent: If there are any changes to our business model, revenue structure, points system, fees, services, privacy practices, or policies that affect users, we will notify ALL types of users (regular users and agents) in advance. Material changes will be communicated with at least one (1) full month's advance notice via email and our communication channels. Continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.
section13.acknowledgment: By using our Service, you acknowledge that you understand AqaarGate operates as a listing platform only, does not interfere between sellers and buyers, and generates revenue solely from listing publications and agent subscriptions, not from property transactions.

section14.title: 14. Contact Us
section14.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
